name: insincerely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you are pretending to feel something that you do not really feel, or do not mean what you say: She smiled insincerely at Howard from time to time. He sent his love insincerely to Kate and hung up. See
insincere
More examplesFewer examples"Clarissa, darling!" she cried, insincerely.He was insincerely anxious to please."Sorry to interrupt," I apologised insincerely.
